EmailTemplate.name: Channel Newsletter 7.9.20.Newsletter 7.9.20
EmailTemplate.subject: Subject Title: eWeekly – The latest NCR Mobile Pay Release is here!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: July 9, 2020 Our latest NCR Mobile Pay Release is here! We’re bringing you more great features in NCR Mobile Pay that will help make running your business even smoother and more time efficient. Check out the NCR Mobile Pay Release notes <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/ry/ek/va/NCR%20Mobile%20Pay%20Release%20Notes%20v19.3.7%5B1%5D.pdf]]> to learn about the latest updates like the auto-select tip feature that has been added to the solution and more.
